text: Hey man, good to hear from you, all well here. You seem quite happy about the developments of things on your side and you are making me curious about Paddington. I'm not too happy about the horror film, nice process but the result is not great. If you want to have a look the film is at <https://vimeo.com/dfx2018/blackice> with password gfs_2019_psw but do not share it for the moment, it's not secret but we are waiting to make it fully public. For the moment I'm wrapping another short project and I'm often on set for some short films in post this autumn.  However, I'm about to start as a comp intern at ETC next week, It'll just last for two months but I'm quite curious about what is going to happen there. I did apply also at BZ but nothing. Indeed I met Francesca at FMX and had a nice chat with her, she seems nice. Let me know your thoughts if you look at the film...

attachments.title: Private video on Vimeo
